dataset.title: C-1 (3018 m) climate station: Chart recorder temperature data.

address.deliveryPoint: Institute of Arctic and Alpine Research

abstract.para: Temperature data were collected from a Niwot Ridge climate station (C-1 @ 3018 m) throughout the year. Instrumentation consisted of a hygrothermograph with a Bourdon tube placed in a white, all wood, louvered Stevenson screen which was oriented with the door facing north. Measurements were recorded on a continuously recording drum chart.

description.para: The initial iteration of the documentation section of this file was created by Mike Hartman in February 1995 using /data1/Datman/Nwtdata/c-1preci.ml as a template. Data for the period 31 January 1988 through 15 April 1996 were appended, and the file was put under sccs on 18 July 1996.[MAH 18 July 1996] Data for the period 16 April 1996 through 2 September 1996 were appended to the data section on 15 October 1996.[MAH 15 October 1996] Data for the period 3 September 1996 through 18 November 1996 were appended to the data section on 3 December 1996.[MAH 3 December 1996] Data for the period 19 November 1996 through 14 April 1997 were appended to the data section on 18 April 1997.[MAH 18 April 1997] Data for the period 15 April 1997 through 4 August 1997 were appended to the data section on 30 September 1997. A comment concerning missing data from 1990 was also added to the comments section on that day as well.[MAH 30 September 1997] Data for 5 August 1997 through 9 March 1998 were appended to the data section on 25 March 1998.[MAH 25 March 1998] Data for 10 March 1998 through 24 August 1998 were appended to the data section on 3 September 1998.[MAH 3 September 1998] Data for 25 August 1998 through 31 December 1998 were appended to the data section on 25 February 1999.[MAH 25 February 1999] Data for 1 January 1999 through 28 December 1999 were appended to the data section on 2 March 2000.[MAH 2 March 2000] URL locations for related data were updated on 21 September 2000.[MAH 21 September 2000] Data for the period 29 December 1999 through 19 March 2001 were appended to the data section on 18 April 2001.[TMA 18 April 2001] Data for the period 13 March 2001 through 22 October 2001 were appended to the data section on 31 October 2001.[TMA 31 October 2001] Data for the period from 23 October through 31 December 2001 were appended to the data section on 28 January 2002. [TMA 28 January 2002] Data for the period 01 January 2002 through 18 March 2002 were appended to the data section.[TMA 25 March 2002] Data for 19 March 12 August were appended.[TMA 06 September 2002] Data for 13 August through 31 December 2002 were appended to the data section on 18 February 2003.[TMA 18 February] Data for 01 January through 16 June 2003 were appended to the data section.[TMA 29 July 2003] Data for 17 June through 31 December 2003 were appended to the data section.[TMA 20 February 2004] Data for 01 January 2004 through 07 June 2004 were appended to the data section.[TMA 06 August 2004] Data for 08 June 2004 through 31 December 2004 were appended to the data section.[TMA 07 March 2005] Data for 01 January through 17 May 2005 were appended to the data section.[TMA 02 August 2005] Data for 18 May 2005 through 31 December 2005 were appended to the data section.[TMA 20 June 2006] Data for 01 January through 31 December 2006 were appended to the data section.[TMA 22 January 2007] Data for 01 January through 31 December 2007 were appended to the data section.[TMA 18 Februrary 2008] Data for 01 January through 22 September 2008 were appended to the data section.[TMA 25 September 2008]
